00018          void checkbox::draw(int type)  {
00019                 gdriver.draw_3dbar_inv(left,top,cwidth,cwidth,15,0,type,2);
00020                   setcolor(color);
00021                  char _text[50];
00022                  int twidth=width-cwidth;
00023                  strcpy(_text,text);
00024                  if(textwidth(text)>twidth)
00025                         {
00026                          _text[twidth/(textwidth(_text)/strlen(_text)+1)]='\0';
00027                         }
00028                  mouse.hide();
00029                  if(checked)
00030                  outtextxy(left+5,top+5,"X");
00031                  settextjustify(LEFT_TEXT,TOP_TEXT);
00032                  setcolor(color);
00033                  outtextxy(left+cwidth+2,top+cwidth/2-1,_text);
00034                  settextjustify(LEFT_TEXT,TOP_TEXT);
00035                  mouse.show();
00036                 }

00038                 int checkbox::interupt(_mouse m)        {

00040                         {

00047                 {

00052         int checkbox::clicked()
00053                 {
00054                 draw();
00055                 while(mouse.isclicked(1));
00056                 point p(mouse.x,mouse.y);
00057                 region r(x,y,x+width,y+height);
00058                 if(!r.contains(p))
00059                       {
00060                        draw();
00061                        return OK;
00062                       }
00063                 checked=!checked; 
00064                 retcode=parent->handle_event_onclick(this);
00065                 draw();
00066                 return retcode;
00067                 }
